q1: The next world cup in Qatar is going to be really interesting, no?
a1: There may be some social issues to be overcome.
q3: Qatar is located in the Middle East, the culture there can be radically different than other countries.
a3: Also, the intense heat may prove to be a problem for visiting teams and fans
q4: Do you think there will be terrorist threat?
q5: Do you think it will still go ahead or get moved to another country ?
a5: I'm not sure if they will move it, that may cause some political problems.
